data.text:
OFTC is ready to help you!

Oconee Fall Line Technical College is proud of its established record as a “service-oriented” provider of outstanding and varied post-secondary educational services and amenities. We want our students to succeed…and we help them to do so!

Student Affairs offices at both the Dublin and Sandersville campuses are open:

Monday through Thursday: 8:00am – 5:30pm

Friday: 8:00am – 1:00pm

OFTC Faculty & Staff Directory (Phone Numbers)

From connecting students with potential employers and arranging for testing accommodations for students with special needs to providing tutoring for a student struggling in math class, we’ve got it covered. Read more about the excellent services and resources offered here at OFTC and be sure to check out the web pages that apply to each service. There’s a lot to learn!

Additional information on Admissions is available in the online OFTC Catalog.

Oconee Fall Line Technical College is accredited by the Commission of the Council on Occupational Education. Oconee Fall Line Technical College does not discriminate on the basis of sex, race, color, national origin, religion, age or disability in admissions, in employment, or in access to its educational programs and/or activities.
